title: Stripe finalizes tender sale at a $91.5B valuation, says payment volumes grew to $1.4T in 2024
body: Digital payments platform Stripe has yet to lay out plans to go public, but in the meantime the company has thrown past and present employees a line for

title: Fintech firm Stripe valued at $91.5 billion in latest tender offer
body: Stripe on Thursday announced a tender offer for employees and shareholders, valuing the company at $91.5 billion, potentially delaying the fintech firm's ambitions of going public.
